Name: Hero Lilith
About the game: This is an open world action role-playing game, developed by one person with Unreal Engine 4. In the game, Lilith was inspired by the goddess and became a hero. From raiding dungeons to helping villagers deliver letters, players can freely choose to fight with melee, bow or magic. Introduction Players can freely choose weapons such as swords, bows, and magic wands to fight. Some weapons have elemental damage and special skills. Attacks with elements that the enemy fears will cause higher damage. Lilith's equipment can be obtained from defeating enemies, or forged by using materials. Each type of equipment has different attributes and appearances, and can be matched according to your own preferences. In addition to the main quests, players will also get side quests from NPC. Some quests are quite challenging. Players can choose whether to perform the quests. Sometimes you need to explore the dungeon, the path of the dungeon will change every time, and you may even encounter special enemies. Note: The story of the early access version has arrived to find out how to get to the desert city.
